cause.description:
Program is a response to • The recently released Double the Numbers for College Success study Which • Highlights the problems DC residents face concerning high school dropout rates, lack of preparation for college level work, and below average postsecondary matriculation and graduation rates
ITS UNIQUE.....it involves DC students as both service recipients and service providers.
We call the program the DC Scholars Program. It is basically a mentoring and tutoring program geared towards DC high school students.
1. Higher education should be made available to all.
2. Howard University owes the DC community and we must do all we can to help them.
3. Life is too short to let an opportunity to help someone pass us by!
cause.mission: help DC teens recognize the opportunities for them after high school.
cause.name: American Humanics - HOWARD U - Scholars Program
